description:
考研英语高频短语复习

1. be covered with

盖着，覆着；

[例句]Plants must be covered with a leaf-mould or similarly protected if frost threatens.

如果霜冻来临，植物必须盖上腐叶土或用类似方法加以保护。

2. be crowded with

充满，满是；

[例句]The door to his house used to be crowded with visitors who had since deserted him.

原先整天门庭若市，现在却“门前冷落车马稀”。

3. be dependent upon

依靠（他人供给吃、住、钱等），依赖；

[例句]Your emotional reaction will be dependent upon your partner's responsiveness.

你的情感反应取决于你伴侣的回应。

4. be derived from

源自于；

[例句]All other quantities in physics can be derived from these fundamental quantities.

由这三个基本量，你可以导出，其他所有的物理量。

5. be determined to

决定；下决心；执意；

[例句]You must be determined to change the past live.

必须要下定决心以改变你过去的生活方式。

6. be different from

不同于；与…不同；

[例句]He wants to push himself forward and be different from the others.

他就爱出风头，搞个人突出。

7. be divided by

被……除以；

[例句]Prime numbers can only be divided by one or itself.

质数只能被和本身整除。

8. be divided into

划分为；

[例句]The physical benefits of exercise can be divided into three factors

运动对身体的好处可以分为3个方面。

9. be eager for

渴望；渴求；

[例句]The two gangster seem to be eager for the fray.

那两个歹徒似乎唯恐不乱。

10. be eager to

盼望，渴望；

[例句]People around you will be eager to know what you will do next.

聚集在你身边的人们热切地想知道你下一步想做什么。

11. be engaged in

从事于；忙于；

[例句]This company has been licensed to be engaged in export business.

这家公司获得了经营出口业务的许可证。

12. be equal to

胜任，相等，合适；

[例句]She was determined that she would be equal to any test the corporation put to them.

她下定决心要成功应对公司对他们的任何考验。

13. be famous for

因…而著名；

[例句]He would be famous for the game.

他将以这场比赛而闻名。

14. be fed up

吃得过饱，极厌倦；

[例句]Little by little, I began to be fed up with examinations.

渐渐地，我开始厌烦起考试来。

15. be filled with

充满着；怀着；

[例句]Will our world be filled with the cold and gloominess of the winter?

将我们的世界充满了寒冷和黑暗的冬天？

16. be fit for

适合于；

[例句]I ought to be fit for work next month.

下个月我想必可以工作了。

17. be fond of

喜爱，爱好；待见；

[例句]Others may be fond of titles and honours, but I am not.

人皆好名，我则不然。

18. be free from

免于…；

[例句]Men are not saints；how can they be free from faults?

人非圣贤，孰能无过？

19. be friendly to

对…友好/友善；

[例句]She be friendly to everybody.

她对所有的人都友善。

20. be frightened at

对…大吃一惊；

[例句]You needn't be frightened at the dog.

你不必怕那条狗。

  • 这3款外语学习类APP，老外最爱用！

title: 2017考研：英语高频短语（34）
